PandolfoAlessandro.Dama.Model

Class Damiera

  • java.lang.Object
    • PandolfoAlessandro.Dama.Model.Damiera

  • public class Damiera
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the model of the game board of Italian dama. Represents the table with an array of integers: 0 = null cell; 1 = white pawn; 2 = black pawn; 3 = white dama; 4 = black dama;
